thread.title: Pharrell, Lil Wayne & Solange to Perform at 10th Annual Roots Picnic | Billboard
thread.title_full: Pharrell, Lil Wayne & Solange to Perform at 10th Annual Roots Picnic | Billboard

author: Billboard Staff
title: Pharrell, Lil Wayne & Solange to Perform at 10th Annual Roots Picnic | Billboard
text:
Michael Rozman/Warner Bros. Pharrell Williams on 'The Ellen DeGeneres Show' on Jan. 5, 2017. 
Pharrell and The Roots , Lil Wayne and Solange are among the headliners confirmed for this year's 10th annual Roots Picnic. 
Speaking of its milestone anniversary, Shawn Gee, Roots longtime manager and partner in Maverick Management, comments, “Ten years ago this started as a concept, an idea, a conversation between me, Tarik ( Black Thought ), Ahmir (Questlove) and Rich (Nichols). It's amazing that it has grown into such a valued piece of the cultural landscape of our hometown of Philadelphia." 10th Annual #RootsPicnic lineup has arrived! Grab your tickets now @ https://t.co/nfVr1GesXg & we'll see you in Philly on Saturday, June 3! pic.twitter.com/4ysCIpSvJI — Roots Picnic (@rootspicnic) February 20, 2017 
The festival will again take place at Festival Piers at Penn’s Landing on June 3, 2017. 
Other performers to grace the stage this year include 21 Savage , Kimbra , Khalid , Michael Kiwanuka and more. Check out the full line-up below. 
10th Annual Roots Picnic lineup Pharrell & The Roots
